EMAIL.REQUIRED: Please enter a valid email address.

TEXT.NO_INITIAL_SPACE: This field cannot start with a space.
TEXT.NO_TRAILING_SPACE: This field cannot end with a space.
TEXT.USERNAME: This field can only have letters and numbers.
TEXT.MAX_WORDS_BETWEEN: This field must have between {{MIN}} and {{MAX}} words.
TEXT.MAX_CHARS: This field must have between {{MIN}} and {{MAX}} characters. You have {{CURR}} characters

PASSWORD.EIGHT_LONG: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
PASSWORD.ONE_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number.
PASSWORD.ONE_SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character.
PASSWORD.ONE_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
PASSWORD.ONE_LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.

LOGIN.CREATE_SUBTITLE: It's free and always will be.
LOGIN.DATA_POLICY: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.
